entries.name: Age
entries: Pixies do not age as normal races do, like most fey, they live indefinitely or until killed. Pixies reach maturity at 20.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Almost all pixies are good, with chaotic ideals of freedom. Simply having fun and enjoying life are typically at the forefront of their desires.

entries.name: Size
entries: Pixies are like tiny elves, standing at barely a foot tall. Your size is Tiny.

entries.name: Flight
entries: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. To use this speed, you can't be wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Size
entries: Pixies are like tiny elves, standing at barely a foot tall. Your size is Tiny.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Living mostly outdoors without exposure to traditional lighting, you have superior vision in dark or dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

entries.name: Nature's Child
entries: The children of the Feywild have a natural gift for the outside world. You are proficient in the Nature skill and can cast the cantrip Druidcraft at will.

entries.name: Wing Regrowth
entries: If your wings are cut, removed or injured, you regrow them at the end of a long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.
